{u'Ref': u'CfnUser'}: can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, dashes and underscores.
The Logical Resource Name - commonly set by parent stack
Name of the EC2 KeyPair we will create internally to access instances in our VPC
Vpc ID of your existing Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
[{u'DeleteOnTermination': u'true', u'DeviceIndex': u'0', u'SubnetId': {u'Ref': u'SubnetId'}, u'GroupSet': [{u'Ref': u'BastionSecurityGroup'}], u'AssociatePublicIpAddress': u'true'}]

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -v
', u'yum update -y aws-cfn-bootstrap
', u'yum install -y python-boto
', u'#do some chef things before the cfn-init due to race issues
', u'/bin/mkdir -p /etc/chef
', u'/bin/mkdir -p /var/lib/chef
', u'/bin/mkdir -p /var/log/chef
', u'/usr/sbin/groupadd chef -r
', u'/usr/sbin/useradd chef -r -s /bin/sh -d /var/lib/chef -g chef
', u'# Helper function
', u'function error_exit
', u'{
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 1 -r "$1" '', {u'Ref': u'BastionHostHandle'}, u"'
", u'  exit 1
', u'}
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -s ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackName'}, u' -r BastionHost ', u'    --access-key ', {u'Ref': u'CfnKeys'}, u'    --secret-key ', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'CfnKeys', u'SecretAccessKey']}, u'    --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u" || error_exit 'Failed to run cfn-init'
", u'#install chef client for later
', u'curl -L http://www.opscode.com/chef/install.sh | bash
', u'cd /etc/chef
', u'/bin/chown -R chef:chef /etc/chef
', u'# All is well so signal success
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 0 -r "Bastion host setup complete" '', {u'Ref': u'BastionHostHandle'}, u"'
"]]}}

{u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/usr/bin/python
', u'import string
', u'import random
', u'import boto.ec2
', u"kp_name = '", {u'Ref': u'BastionKeyName'}, u"'
", u"ec2 = boto.ec2.connect_to_region('", {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u"')
", u'keypair = ec2.create_key_pair(kp_name)
', u"keypair.save('/home/ec2-user/.ssh/')
", u"print 'Created keypair: %s' % kp_name
"]]}

[{u'PolicyName': u'root', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u'ec2:CreateKeyPair', u'ec2:DescribeKeyPairs', u'ec2:DescribeRegions', u'ec2:ImportKeyPair'], u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}, {u'Action': u'cloudformation:DescribeStackResource', u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}]
[{u'ToPort': u'22', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': {u'Ref': u'SSHFrom'}, u'FromPort': u'22'}]
Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance

{u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'[Credentials]
', u'aws_access_key_id = ', {u'Ref': u'CfnKeys'}, u'
', u'aws_secret_access_key = ', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'CfnKeys', u'SecretAccessKey']}, u'
', u'[Boto]
', u'ec2_region_name = ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'
', u'ec2_region_endpoint = ec2.', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'.amazonaws.com
']]}
Lockdown SSH access to the instance (default can be accessed from anywhere)
